name: Mathilde Girard
routine: Mathilde Girard typically falls asleep at 11:30 pm and wakes at 7am for her morning run.
occupation: She is a fashion designer, working in her studio from 10 am until sometimes late evening.
thoughts: Mathilde is excited as her new clothing line received great feedback at a recent fashion exhibition on February 2nd, 2024.
lifestyle: She enjoys the French Mediterranean diet, likes to unwind by playing the piano, and favors a chic and vibrant home decor.
